attributes.action: Direct the motor industry to replace Miles Per Gallon fuel economy figures with Miles Per Litre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the UK we no longer buy fuel in gallons, but still use miles to measure distances.
It is therefore not relevent to measure fuel economy in terms of gallons (mpg) or kilometers (km/l) as neither reflect UK usage, so a combined metric/imperial measurement of economy (miles per litre) needs to be introduced.
